text: John Kaye (23 October 1955 â€“ 2 May 2016 ) was an Australian politician. He was elected to the New South Wales Legislative Council in 2007. He represented the Greens. He was known for his support of renewable energy and energy efficiency. He was a spokesperson for public schools and TAFE colleges. ==References== ==Other websites== *John Kaye's homepage Category:Australian Greens politicians Category:Politicians from New South Wales Category:1955 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Australia
title: John Kaye (politician)
